content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, while my name in this scenario is Peter Schmidt from Germany, let us focus on discussing the rental price for the apartment in München. I have an ambitious goal to secure the highest price possible for this well-located 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. Let's see if we can find common ground in our negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Peter Schmidt, although my character aims to minimize expenses as a student, I understand we must discuss the rental price for the apartment in Munich. To begin negotiations, I'd like to express my interest while keeping the price reasonable due to student budget constraints. TERMINATE if you have a price in mind that we can consider.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
